description: This file defines the IUserService interface within the NotesBackend.Application.Users namespace, declaring asynchronous methods related to user registration, credential validation, and retrieval by ID.

classes.name: IUserService
classes.description: Interface defining user-related operations such as registration, validation, and retrieval.

methods.name: RegisterAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously registers a new user with email, displayName, and password.

methods.name: ValidateCredentialsAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously validates user credentials with email and password, returning a User if valid.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a User by their unique identifier.
